snippet: A 20-year-old former community college student was being sought for the fatal shooting of a campus print shop director whom he used to work under, the authorities said.
abstract: Goldsboro, NC, authorities say 20-year-old former Wayne Community College student Kenneth M Stancil III is being sought for the fatal shooting of Ron Lane, campus print shop director who had been Stancil's work-study manager.
lead_paragraph: A 20-year-old former community college student was being sought for the fatal shooting of a campus print shop director whom he used to work under, the authorities said.

headline.main: North Carolina: Ex-student Sought in Killing at Community College
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: Ex-student Sought in Killing at Community College
